title: So whats going stop ppl from stacking teams in high elo with the new ranked ''solo q''?
body:
?????

Like what is the point of playing solo q anymore anyway, i get that riot wants this game to be 100% team reliant and solo players always get the shaft every season but i think this is a bad idea.

Now imagine a bunch of high diamond all making smurfs and q'ing as 5 in low elo, lmao.
